mapper.insert: INSERT INTO messages (message_id, author_id, conversation_id, content) VALUES (messages_seq.nextval, #{authorId}, #{conversationId}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT m.message_id, m.conversation_id, m.author_id, m.content, m.creation_time FROM (SELECT conversation_id, MAX(creation_time) c_t FROM messages GROUP BY conversation_id) x , messages m WHERE x.c_t = m.creation_time ) a LEFT JOIN participations b ON a.conversation_id= b.conversation_id WHERE user_id = #{userId}
